thread.title: Quantum to Present on Maximizing Data Availability On-site and in the Cloud at VeeamON 2015
thread.title_full: Quantum to Present on Maximizing Data Availability On-site and in the Cloud at VeeamON 2015

title: Quantum to Present on Maximizing Data Availability On-site and in the Cloud at VeeamON 2015
text: Quantum to Present on Maximizing Data Availability On-site and in the Cloud at VeeamON 2015   Published on 2015-10-22 16:44:33 Quantum to Present on Maximizing Data Availability On-site and in the... -- SAN JOSE, Calif.  Quantum Logo Quantum Logo <-  <- stripped tags -> SAN JOSE, Calif.   Quantum Corp. (NYSE: [[]]) today announced that Eric Bassier , senior director of product marketing for Quantum, and Marius Marcu , data protection solutions marketing manager for Quantum, will present at the VeeamON 2015 conference. Attendees will learn how Veeam and Quantum have joined forces to help customers maximize data availability with tiered storage solutions that balance performance and cost, and offer multiple choices to protect data without breaking the bank. The presentation will outline the key factors to be considered when evaluating a data protection solution for virtual environments and the steps IT can take to cut storage costs without sacrificing production system performance or availability. Topic: Easy as 3-2-1. Maximize Availability with Veeam, On-site and in the Cloud Date: Wednesday, Oct. 28
